\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2025808143cfeef1a533055522aef4c5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={162}
w_1 = \frac{m \sum x^{(i)} y^{(i)} - \sum x^{(i)} \sum y^{(i)}}
  {m \sum (x^{(i)})^2 - (\sum x^{(i)})^2}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={166}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[b6468ea8c3d47d88f1d8d3ada1d5f1f0]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={167}
  w_1 = \frac{\sum x^{(i)} y^{(i)} - m \bar{x}\bar{y}}
  {\sum (x^{(i)})^2 - m \bar{x}^2}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6851489da1983751f1011d2478c76d2b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={175}
w_0 = \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} y^{(i)} - w_1 \frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m} x^{(i)}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={178}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[dd9b87cef2c068d17327ddadcd46485a]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={179}
  w_0 = \bar{y} - w_1 \bar{x}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
